channel.title: Blitz-PK [the old PvP Planet brought back]
channel.description:
This is essentially the best PK server out. It is the oldschool PvP Planet in Goblin Village remade & remastered to a higher spec and new features. (yes i am Jinrake). This is a very quick post. [u][b]Website:[/b][/u] Http://www.blitzpk.com [u][b]Play:[/b][/u] Http://www.play.blitzpk.com A few features include: - No lag - Fully complete combat, 100% working - Curses - Fully working magic - War minigame brought back - Fully custom PvP drop system. - Custom PK reward system - PK Targets - Killstreaks & on homepage [you can see this right now] & http://blitzpk.com/killscript.php - Top Killstreaks in game have red skulls, find them and kill them - Corp. beast has switching status lairs - PvP Levels & combat at home. - Set your levels on login!!
"The higher killstreak you are on, the more PK Points per kill you earn.", "If you kill someone on a Kill Streak, you get a random chance of winning a rare!", "The War area is a great way to earn PvP Points!", "Killing your Target gives you a chance to recieve a rare item!", "The more you risk while fighting, the more you are rewarded!", "Players with a red skull are on a Kill Streak, kill them for goodies!", "Tokens are dropped occasionally. Convert them in your Quest Tab!", "Some items require a certian kill amount to weild!", "Stack up your kill amount to recieve extra rewards, such as a Fire Cape at 100 kills!", "A Fire Cape can be unlocked at 100 kills!", "Exchange your PK Points with Mandrith at home for exclusive items!", "Fight the Corporal Beast for items you cannot recieve elsewhere!", "'The higher you risk, the higher you get'"
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/qh0j237uv/28912_31604.jpg[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/8usnxazrb/28912_31602.jpg[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/dqwaozzwn/28912_31603.jpg[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/wx9hs6geb/28912_31605.jpg[/img]

item.title: Blitz-PK [the old PvP Planet brought back]
item.dc:creator: @Flame_pkz Flame pkz
item.description:
@Flame_pkz wrote:

This is essentially the best PK server out. It is the oldschool PvP Planet in Goblin Village remade & remastered to a higher spec and new features. (yes i am Jinrake). This is a very quick post.

Website: Http://www.blitzpk.com
Play: Http://www.play.blitzpk.com

A few features include:

  • No lag
  • Fully complete combat, 100% working
  • Curses
  • Fully working magic
  • War minigame brought back
  • Fully custom PvP drop system.
  • Custom PK reward system
  • PK Targets
  • Killstreaks & on homepage [you can see this right now] & http://blitzpk.com/killscript.php
  • Top Killstreaks in game have red skulls, find them and kill them
  • Corp. beast has switching status lairs
  • PvP Levels & combat at home.
  • Set your levels on login!!
"The higher killstreak you are on, the more PK Points per kill you earn.", "If you kill someone on a Kill Streak, you get a random chance of winning a rare!", "The War area is a great way to earn PvP Points!", "Killing your Target gives you a chance to recieve a rare item!", "The more you risk while fighting, the more you are rewarded!", "Players with a red skull are on a Kill Streak, kill them for goodies!", "Tokens are dropped occasionally. Convert them in your Quest Tab!", "Some items require a certian kill amount to weild!", "Stack up your kill amount to recieve extra rewards, such as a Fire Cape at 100 kills!", "A Fire Cape can be unlocked at 100 kills!", "Exchange your PK Points with Mandrith at home for exclusive items!", "Fight the Corporal Beast for items you cannot recieve elsewhere!", "'The higher you risk, the higher you get'"
